remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures do not require its use.

note.para: APU may be used for electric power.

placard.para: Placard APU Bleed Valve Control Switch "PNEUMATIC FUNCTION INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Select APU Bleed Air Valve Switch to OFF.
Ensure VALVE Light and APU BLD VAL EICAS message are not illuminated.
If there is indication the valve did not close, use MEL 36-11-4 for deferral.
